nodes.text: A Dreadnought-class heavy cruiser was used by the Galactic Republic and it beared Republic markings. At some point during the Galactic Civil War, the Dreadnought-class heavy cruiser emerged from hyperspace near an abandoned Republic supply depot, damaged and broadcasting a distress call for any Republic forces. The ship had young clone troopers on board who knew nothing of the existance of a Galactic Empire.
Some individuals who were visiting the abandoned depot at that time contacted the Dreadnought.

The Republic Dreadnought was first mentioned, albeit unnamed, in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games sourcebook Starships and Speeders. The book includes an adventure seed for use with the Star Wars Roleplaying series, and this article assumes the scenario plays out as described.
